title: Introducing Advanced Tool Use on the Claude Developer Platform
author: Bin Wu
three_features_announced: Tool Search Tool - on-demand tool discovery without loading all definitions upfront
Programmatic Tool Calling - invoke tools via code execution reducing context pollution and inference overhead
Tool Use Examples - concrete usage examples beyond JSON schemas improving accuracy
content_summary: Anthropic engineering blog announcing three beta features for advanced tool use: Tool Search Tool enabling on-demand discovery of tools to cut 85% of tool definition tokens, Programmatic Tool Calling enabling code-based tool invocation for 37% token reduction and improved accuracy, and Tool Use Examples providing realistic usage patterns to improve complex parameter handling accuracy from 72% to 90%.
